title: Atomic Heart Review Round Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.20.23
description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/kindafunny65 and use code kindafunny65 for 65% off plus free shipping!

Greg and Tim reunite to talk about Atomic Heart reviews, Greg's played Octopath Traveler 2, and Zelda Tears of The Kingdom art book leaks!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:11:27 - Housekeeping
A new Last of Us HBO episode review is up as a Screencast.
The Roper Report   -
00:14:17 - Atomic Heart review round up
00:20:33 - PSA: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Art Book Has Seemingly Leaked Online
00:24:10 - Miyamoto says Nintendo is ‘always working on Mario’ but isn’t ready to share anything just yet
00:29:28 - Blizzard workers are upset after a company meeting
00:40:01 - It looks like Returnal is off to a slow start on PC
00:45:32 - Redfall’s Physical Release Will Contain A Disc After All
00:47:57 - Out today
00:52:27 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Krysta!
